skills.name: Combat Knife
skills.description: Swings a dagger to attack the enemy 2 times and subsequently increases your Attack Power for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Sharp Strike
skills.description: Attacks an enemy and inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns. This attack will also decrease the enemy's Defense for 2 turns if it lands as a Critical Hit.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Born to Fight (Passive)
skills.description: The attacks performed on your turns will generate a shield that lasts for 1 turn. The shield is equivalent to 50% of the damage dealt. Also, this effect increases your Critical Rate by 30%. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Shield
skill_effect.description: A shield is created to absorb a portion of incoming damage
